name: Microchip Fractal Mazes
description:
Recursive logic mazes inspired by the original works of Mark J.P. Wolf (2003) and a Wolfram demo project authored by Ed Pegg Jr (2011): https://www.demonstrations.wolfram.com/FractalMaze/  

  • Number of puzzles: 4
  • Average play time: 45 mins 
  • First published: May 2021 (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart. 
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

Hackable version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=7c6fe7b9f6397c0006da099d7f015cea

For more clickmazes puzzles visit: http://www.clickmazes.com/index.htm
